Package main.window

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminPanel
    This class provide admin activities for the user, It has three different panel to provide configure the system, set schedule and generate bill.
    BillPanel
    This class generates and print Bill of the current month.
    ConfigureCard
    This class provide graphical interface to configure the security system.
    RegistrationPanel
    A panel for registering new user.
    SchedulePanel
    Schedule Panel, it has two parts to set up and view schedule.
    SetSchedule
    User can set up schedule of the sensors.
    SystemLogin
    Log in window for admin login.
    UserInterface
    Initial class, the system starts from here.
    ViewSchedule
    Show user all upcoming the schedules in JTable.
